description: This file defines a WebSocket client class 'SocketClient' for real-time chat communication in a React-based frontend. It handles WebSocket connection management, message sending, auto-reconnection, and callback handling for events.

classes.name: SocketClient
classes.description: Reusable WebSocket client managing connection lifecycle, message handling, auto-reconnect, and callbacks for a chat frontend.

methods.name: constructor({ url, onMessage, onOpen, onClose, onError, getAuthToken, autoReconnect = true, reconnectDelayMs = 1000, } = {})
methods.description: Initializes a new SocketClient instance with configuration options and sets up internal state.

methods.name: connect()
methods.description: Establishes the WebSocket connection, sets up event listeners, and manages auto-reconnect logic.

methods.name: send(objOrString)
methods.description: Sends a message over the WebSocket connection; accepts object (automatically JSON-stringified) or string.

methods.name: disconnect()
methods.description: Closes the WebSocket connection and disables auto-reconnect.

ctags.name: constructor
ctags.signature: ({ url, onMessage, onOpen, onClose, onError, getAuthToken, autoReconnect = true, reconnectDelayMs = 1000, } = {})
